p: Representative concentration pathway 8.5 assumes that the global warming will rise from 1.4 to 2.6 and 2.6 to 4.8 °C between the years 2046 and 2064 and 2081–2100, respectively. Mean global sea level will increase from 0.22 to 0.38 and 0.45 to 0.82 m over the same periods ( Stocker et al., 2013).
